column4: omg.. what are my possibilities if 2 of my buttons doesn't show up in "xev" nor in acpi_listen?
depends on the mouse..  check dmesg - see if  shows the mouse clicks.. you may need to remap the buttons somehow.

google for the exact mouse/linux and see if other disrto sites/wiki pages also discuss it. I have found some very good info on the gentoo wiki pages that helped me getting weird things toing in ubuntu :)
